skins.name: Lynae
skins.description: The Startorch Academy's prep uniform, "slightly modified" for Lynae's taste, tailored to minimize drag at high speeds. And yes, the splashes of color are a crucial part of the design!

tags.name: DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Tune Rupture Response
tags.description: Deals Tune Rupture DMG to targets

tags.name: Tune Strain Response
tags.description: Gains total DMG increase from Tune Break Boost

tags.name: Tune Break Boost
tags.description: Provides additional Tune Break Boost for a specific Resonator in the team

265.name: Days to be Painted Like a Canvas
265.description:
The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> is increased by {0}.
The duration of <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> is increased by {1}. Targets within the range of <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> are <color=Highlight>pulled in</color> towards the center every {2}s.
Lynae is now immune to interruptions during <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color>.
During <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, after staying in a non-combat state for {3}s, restore {4} points of <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> every {3}s.

266.name: Into Lights' Vanishing Point
266.description:
Gain {0} All DMG Amplification.
Outro Skill gains the following effect:
Casting Outro Skill now additionally grants the incoming Resonator {1} All DMG Amplification for {2}s or until the Resonator is switched out.

267.name: For One Brilliant Moment
267.description:
The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color> is increased by {4}.
While Lynae is in combat, when <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> is at least 120 points, gain 1 stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> every {0}s, up to {1} stacks. Each stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> increases the Spectro DMG Bonus of <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color> by {2}. No <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> is gained while casting <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color>. When <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color> ends, remove all stacks of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color>. Lynae loses a stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> every {3}s when <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> is below 120 points.
While Lynae is out of combat, with at least 120 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, gain 1 stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> every 0.5s; when <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> is below 120 points, lose 1 stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> every 1s.

269.name: Visions of a Future Unbound
269.description: The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Prismatic Overblast</color> is increased by {0}.

270.name: Painted in My True Color
270.description:
Each time <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Graffiti Blast</color> or <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color> is cast, Lynae gains 1 stack of <color=Highlight>Color of Soul</color>, up to {2} stacks. Each stack of <color=Highlight>Color of Soul</color> increases the DMG the target takes from <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> by {3}. After casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color> or <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color>, all stacks of <color=Highlight>Color of Soul</color> are removed.
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> resets the charges of <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color>.
Lynae is immune to interruptions, and DMG taken is reduced by {5} during <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color>.
Lynae now stays in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> after casting <color=Highlight>Outro Skill - Let's Hit the Road!</color>.
The <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> upper limit is increased from {0} to {1}. At the max limit, Lynae's roller skating speed further increases.
If Intro Skill is cast during <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, restore {4} points of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>.

params.name: Chroma Drift
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} or hold Normal Attack to perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Spark Collision</color></size>
With full <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> in the <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, hold Normal Attack to enter a charging state.
During this state, 15 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> will be converted to 12.5% of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> every 0.2s. Lynae is immune to interruption and takes {0} less DMG.
Upon releasing Normal Attack or when <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> is full, Lynae casts Spark Collision of varying strengths based on the ratio of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>:
- Spark Collision Lv. 1: <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> <50%
- Spark Collision Lv. 2: 50% â‰¤ <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> < 100%
- Spark Collision Lv. 3: <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>=100%
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack</color>.
Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
With 120 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 1 & 4</color> track enemies in a greater distance.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, hold Normal Attack on the ground to cast this skill. Consume STA to continuously attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG. Release to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Graffiti Blast</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, hold Normal Attack in mid-air to cast this skill. Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
Cannot gain new charges while in the air. The available charges reset when Lynae is the active Resonator and is on the ground.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack</color>.
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Dodge Counter</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Dodge Counter</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.

1509011.name: Basic Attack - Spark Collision Lv. 1 DMG

1509012.name: Basic Attack - Spark Collision Lv. 2 DMG

1509013.name: Basic Attack - Spark Collision Lv. 3 DMG

1509014.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 1 DMG

1509015.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2 DMG

1509016.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 3 DMG

1509017.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 4 DMG

1509018.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 5 DMG

1509023.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack DMG

1509028.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack DMG

1509035.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack STA Cost Per Strike

1509036.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack STA Cost

1509037.name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack STA Cost

params.name: Lynae-Style Palettes
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Lynae-Style Palettes</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Resonance Skill to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. 
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, hold Resonance Skill to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and exiting the <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>. 
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time after this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Lynae-Style Palettes and Additive Color <color=Highlight>share a cooldown</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Additive Color</color></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Skill on the ground to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
Within a certain time during the skill, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Lynae-Style Palettes and Additive Color <color=Highlight>share a cooldown</color>.

params.name: Prismatic Overblast
params.description:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Casting this skill increases the DMG dealt by all nearby Resonators in the team by {0} for {1}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time after casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Prismatic Overblast</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack within a certain time during the skill to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.

1509027.name: Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow! DMG

params.name: Colors Never Fade!
params.description:
After casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color>, Lynae leaves <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> on the ground and continuously inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets within the <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> for {1}s, triggered once every {0}s. When <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> is on the ground, switching to another <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode</color> doesn't affect the <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> effects inflicted by the <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
With Lynae in the team, the expedition motorbike's Energy Tank expands by 600 points. Lynae enters <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> automatically while on the expedition motorbike and restores 20% of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> per second.

params.name: "Adaptive Optics: Everyday Applications"
params.description:
Casting <color=Highlight>Intro Skill - Time to Show Some Colors!</color> increases Lynae's <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> Bonus by {1} for {0}s. 
<size=10></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, if Lynae isn't in combat, dodging without directional input grants her <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color> for {2}s, which will be removed when Lynae casts any skill other than dodging or is switched off the field. Performing environmental, gameplay or functional interactions, or entering combat, removes the <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color>. With <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color>, Lynae may enter the enemy's aggro range without triggering combat.

params.name: Time to Show Some Colors!
params.description:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, inflicting <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit.
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, casting this skill recovers {0} points of <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>.

1509029.name: Time to Show Some Colors! DMG

params.name: Chromaticity Modeling
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Optical Sampling Stage</color></size>
Lynae is in <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color> by default. While in this state, <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> recovers during certain skills.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color></size>
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Spark Collision</color> sends Lynae into <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>. In this state, Lynae continuously recovers <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> while moving on the ground or during certain periods of certain skills. Lynae will not Walk during this state, and her Running and Sprinting will be replaced by the faster <color=Highlight>Free Skating</color> and <color=Highlight>Speed Skating</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, with at least 1/3 of the max <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, Jump is replaced by <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color>.
Consume 1/3 of the max <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit. Successful Dodges can be triggered within a certain time during this skill. While airborne, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> chains up to 3 stages. Switching to another Resonator resets the combo.
While in combat, each stage of <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> cast recovers 1 point of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>.
Within a certain time after <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap Stage 1</color> {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack on the ground to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap Stage 2</color> also pulls in nearby targets.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, when Lynae is in mid-air with 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>, and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> is on cooldown, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack or Resonance Skill to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit.
This skill consumes 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time during this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, when Lynae is in mid-air with 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>, and this skill is not on cooldown, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack or Resonance Skill to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit.
This skill consumes 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color> and grants all nearby Resonators in the team {0} points of Tune Break Boost for {1}s.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time during this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>. 
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Mode</color></size>
Inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> when hitting a target with <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> and <color=Highlight>Intro Skill - Time to Show Some Colors!</color>.
Lynae can switch between <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color> and <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Strain</color>:
- When in <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>, <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color> on targets for 25s.
- When in <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Strain</color>, <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on targets for 25s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Tune Rupture Response - Spectral Analysis</color></size>
Deal an instance of <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Tune Rupture DMG, to targets within range affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Overflow</color></size>
Lynae can hold up to 120 points of Overflow.
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> recovers during Basic Attack, Lynae-Style Palettes, Mid-air Attack, and Dodge Counter, or when Intro Skill is cast.
When <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> is full, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Spark Collision</color> becomes available.
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Spark Collision</color> removes all <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Lumiflow</color></size>
Lynae can hold up to 120 points of Lumiflow.
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>:
- Restore 20% of <color=Highlight>Lumiflow</color> per second when Lynae is moving on the ground/climbing, or performs a successful Dodge on the ground, or within a certain time during <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Dodge Counter</color>, <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color>, ground Dodge, Intro Skill, or <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Lumiflow</color> starts to deplete by 20% per second while Lynae is staying still on the ground/climbing/swimming or off the field, or after a certain time following the use of the skills listed above.
- <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> does not change while Lynae is not in any of the states described above.
Exiting <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> removes all <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>.
With 120 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, Lynae's roller skating speed further increases. <color=Highlight>Speed Skating</color> consumes STA over time.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>True Color</color></size>
Lynae can hold up to 3 points of True Color.
During combat, each time <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> is cast, gain 1 point of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>. With 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> become available.
Exiting <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> removes all <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>.

1509032.name: Tune Rupture Response - Spectral Analysis DMG

1509042.name: Roller Skating STA Cost Per Sec at Max Overflow

params.name: Let's Hit the Road!
params.description:
Attack the target and deal {0} <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. The next incoming Resonator gain {1} All DMG Amplification and {2} Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification for 14s or until they are switched out.
Lynae leaves the <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> state upon casting Outro Skill.

params.name: Spectral Analysis
params.description:
Lynae can inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color> or <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on targets.
Lynae can respond to <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color> and <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>.
- Responding to <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>: When any Resonator in the team deals <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> DMG and inflicts the <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color> state, Lynae casts <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture Response - Spectral Analysis</color>. Each target can be damaged by this skill up to once every 8s.
- Responding to <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>: For each stack of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target, each point of Lynae's Tune Break Boost increases her total DMG against that target by {1}. When Lynae is in the team, the target's max stack limit of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> is increased by 1.
When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, Lynae can cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
